flavor: "This steed will not be broken to rein and saddle, nor will I compromise my clan in the name of peace."
illustrator: Shawn Ignatius Tan and Le Vuong
name: Shinjo Altansarnai
text: Reaction: After you break a province during a [conflict-military] conflict in which this character is participating, your opponent chooses a character he or she controls â€“ discard that character.
